Non mi sono mai piaciuti i "Survivor vs. Killer games" ma devo dire che questo mi ha fatto cambiare idea sul genere.

La storia c'e e non c'e ma in sintesi:
Un entità ci ha trasportati nella sua realtà nella quale i sopravvissuti dovranno sopravvivere a dei killer che dovranno ucciderli e sacrificarli cossichè l'entità sia compiaciuta ( o qualcosa di simile )

2 Tipi di Gameplay
-Survivor:
Il gameplay del survivor è in terza persona,il suo obiettivo e di riparare generatori per alimentare una porta che servirà per fuggire dalla mappa.
Il survivor è inerme e ergo non può combattere i killer,potete solo scappare e nascondervi ( si,potete scaraventare un pallet in testa al killer per stordirlo ma serve relativamente )
Il punto di forza dei survivor è il TEAMWORK,se si collabora si riesce a scappare anche dal più ostico dei killer
e nel fatto del TEAMWORK si intende:
Curare le persone,aiutare a riparare generatori,distrarre il killer,togliere i survivors dagli uncini ecc...

-Killer
Il gameplay del killer è in prima persona,il suo obiettivo è uccidere tutti i survivors ( Normalmente o mettendoli sui ganci )
come killer avrai un ampia gamma di strumenti e mosse per inseguire,intrappolare,ferire e uccidere i survivors
La parte importante del killer è la TATTICA,rushare incontro ai survivor è efficace solo contro i novellini; i survivors più esperti sanno sfruttare l'ambiente per renderti la vita difficile,come killer bisogna sfruttare le proprie abilità.

Aggiungiamo che c'e un sistema di power up,che è possibile giocare con i propri amici e vabbeh come gioco da giocare ci stà

Unica pecca:
Il Killer è l'host delle partite
I Survivors i client
Se il Killer abita in congo o voi avete na connessione da poraccio preparatevi a laggate mostruose

I don't play scary games at all. especially FPS horror games. 

But this one is more than just jump scares and running for your life. With perks and one time use tools and tokens - it adds more strategy than one might expect. Being the killer does not mean you're guarenteed a  win - being a victim does not mean you're going to survive. 

Each match has the same formula, start generators - open exit - escape / hide - don't get hooked - save your friends - disctract the killer. Each killer has it's own special ability, from blinking to invisibility.

Добро пожаловать в Dead by Daylight

Шикарная атмосфера! Отличная идея! Без скучной завязки, только action! Покажи себя командным игроком или одиночкой. Или просто убей их всех.
Всё это сдобрено хорошей графикой и и проберающим до костей звуковым сопровождением. Random ные карты, тактика, умение и удача. Взаимопомощь или равнодушие.Страх или Адреналиновый взрыв? Тебя ждет все это!


Конечно, хотелось бы доработки баланса! Особенно на высоких уровнях.

Конечно, хотелось бы большей кастомизации, вариантов причесок и одежды! Да бы избежать атаки клонов на маньяка))

Конечно, хотелось бы лучшей подборки по силе игроков и регионам! Проблемы общения испанца, француза и русского)))

Конечно, хотелось бы вменяемое комъюнити, которое не обсуждает твоих родственников и их половую жизнь! 

Конечно, хотелось бы голосовой чат, чтобы иметь возможенсть шепнуть, человеку слабого ума, что над ним уже летают вороны и пора уже что-то делать. А не сидеть собака в шкафу в ожидании чуда! а скорее ножа маньяка...хотя этот пункт спорный из-за возможной потери атмосферы. Но очень хочется :)

Конечно, хотелось бы рейтингов, чемпионатов.хочется почесать своё ЭГО))) и показать свою ошеломительность миру!

Конечно хотелось бы много...., но не забывайте, что игра развивается! В игре регулярно происходят обновления. Так же выходят дополнения с новыми маньяками и жертвами.И да они платные. Но когда ты идешь в кофе, за чаем, ты не спрашиваешь.А почему мой досуг стоит денег? Вы покупаете ОЩУЩЕНИЯ, АДРЕНАЛИН, ....это же неописуемо, когда ты один, ночью, слышишь биение сердца .А  затем слышишь, как завелась пила позади тебя и ладони твои покрываются потом. секунду спустя тень маньяка пробегает рядом с тобой....ты вжимаешься в куст... он пробегает рядом с тобой и о счастье, мимо....рядом крик...твой брат по несчастью упал....ты готовишься бежать на выручку с ухмылкой вспоминая, как сорвал ненавистные крюки....но что такой....маньяк встает над жертвой и начинает крамсать её ни куда не перенося....просто убивает у тебя на глазах...а ты бессилен...накатывает одно желание бежааааааааать...
Вот за этим чувством я и многие мои друзья играем в онлайн игры на выживание... 

И если вы любитель пощекотать себе нервы с друзьями, эту игру я вам точно советую установить!
Приятной игры! И до встречи в мире Dead by Daylight

Ich hab schon ewig ein Auge auf dieses Spiel geworfen und es juckte mir die ganze Zeit in den Fingern, es endlich mal selber zu spielen, da ich es bisher nur aus Let's Plays kannte. 
War natürlich umso geiler, als ich es zu Weihnachten geschenkt bekommen habe und hab es gleich mit Freunden den halben Tag durchgesuchtet :D
Auf jeden Fall Suchtgefahr, Nervenkitzel und immer wieder aufs Neue spannend :))

This game has been out for six months already, and I hyped it perhaps a bit too much. It's a fun game, it's a cool concept, and it serves it's purpose, however I keep running into a main menu game breaking bug that forces me to exit the game and restart it. That, and a bug that throws me out of online lobbies are things I can't help but think other people are experiencing too. As always, DLC shouldn't come before bug fixes, and with bugs this large you'd think they'd get fixed sooner, but all in all a decent game. I bought it on sale, I wasn't going to pay full price because I had heard it was pretty buggy.

Like many others, I love this game. There's not many other games that can effectively scratch the need to play hide-and-seek like this game does. There's so many things it gets right, and if you're a fan of horror movies like I am, you'll be thrilled at the little moments the game gets right: being chased by an unstoppable killer, desperate for some help or relief (or being the one doing the chasing).

Obviously, this would be a huge, stonking thumbs up if everything else bar the gameplay was in place- which it just isn't.

The matchmaking and lobby system for DBD is absolutely horrendous, and will be the true thing you'll be struggling with constantly, rather than a killer. You'll get into lobbies, only to be unceremoniously kicked or crashed to your desktop. You'll connect into a game and the killer will instantly drop. Sometimes the game won't give you the pleasure of letting you know a queue's failed for some random reason and you'll just be sitting there with your mates twiddling your thumbs in the lobby.

Long loading times abound, endless loading screens as well. This is a well-reported issue to the DBD devs, judging by older reviews from Early Access, and remains unfixed.

It pains me to say don't buy this, but it's the only fair response. Until the networking issues are fixed, this is a flawed gem, with all the caveats that come with it. Keep it on your wishlist, check the discussion forums/Reddit or whatever takes your fancy, and pick it up when it's fixed- if that ever happens.

Alternatively, the Friday 13th game is on the way, and if that isn't a buggy mess on launch it's likely going to kick DBD into the dust, so I'll see you there.

"[i]Уникальный в своём жанре проект, который уже нашёл своё место под солнцем и обзавёлся армией фанатов. В ней есть всё, присущее жанру "слэшер-хоррор": огромные свирепые маньяки-мясники и паранормальные сущности, мрачные атмосферные локации со своей историей, и шкафчики! в которых любят посидеть пугливые людишки. Так же стоит отметить уникальную (извините за тавтологию) систему геймплея в виде починики генераторов и умерщвления выживших с помощью жертвенных крюков, и именно из-за своей уникальности игра стоит свеч! Она не идеальна, в ней есть множество косяков и багов, которые разработчики нехотя стараются исправлять, но лично со мной они случаются крайне редко и вряд ли нарушают игровой баланс.[/i]" - так я думал изначально.

Но для меня эта игра стала неоднозначной. Неплохая задумка, но ужасная реализация убивает её в моих глазах. Постоянная игра в хороводы с маньяком из раза в раз быстро может наскучить и утомить, а кривой движок и соединение заставят вас не раз негодовать от ударов сквозь доски, окна и несколько метров безопасного расстояния. Проект, задумывавшийся как слэшер-хоррор плавно перебрался в простой экшОн, способный разве что насмешить и повеселить игроков, нежели напугать.
Игра обладает достаточно высоким порогом вхождения, из-за чего новичкам будут довольно тяжело осваивать игровые механики, тайминги и движения. (А некоторым даже будет казаться, что маньяки чрезмерно сильны, и их надо ослаблять 😆).

На момент обновления обзора этот проект переживает не лучшие годы. У разработчиков явно наступил творческий кризис, ибо, создавая новый контент, они паразитируют на популярных культурах с целью привлечения новых игроков, и в то же время даже не пытаясь прислушаться к "старикам" и удержать их. Но правда такова, что эта игра для настоящих олдов! Для тех, кто в ней с самого начала. Для тех, кто любит историю её мира. Для тех, кто наблюдал весь путь её становления, и кто прошёл через бесчисленное множество переработок, нёрфов и баффов. Для тех, кто давно стал частью игрового сообщества. А не для тех, кто ничего в ней не понимает, не хочет разбираться и заходит, чтобы навести хаос в матчах. Исходя из этого, этот проект новичкам я рекомендовать не буду.

Dead by Daylight is not a horror game. I think we all know this now, since the marketing tone has shifted from a 4v1 horror experience to a 4v1 competitive action experience. And that's mostly what DbD is.

But to be completely honest with you, this game played at the highest level of skill is very boring. It's the same 6 or 7 perks in rotation, the same 4 or 5 killers, the same items and addons. DbD shifts its meta slower than literally any game I have ever seen. The perk Decisive Strike has been a must-have and extremely powerful for nearly 5 years, only just now is it so butchered that it's seeing less usage.

HOWEVER. Most of the players in this game are not that good. And that's where the fun is. Dead by Daylight isn't fun when you play Spirit with broken addons and gen regression perks against a 4 man SWF all with keys, medkits, BT and Unbreakable. Dead by Daylight is fun when you experiment with new builds and fun killers.

You could play nothing but the most on-meta build 24/7, but no matter what that's going to get incredibly stale. You might see a lot of talk about the community this game has and how 'terrible' it is, but in reality it's just people joining bandwagons on the forums about what's broken or annoying. When you actually play the game you might get some toxicity but it is FAR better than most competitive games, like Valorant, League of Legends, Overwatch, CoD, etc.

In fact, this community more often than not does things that benefit the other team just because it's funny, or it's nice. Like a killer giving survivors a free escape just because they played well, or letting someone escape because they got screwed over by a bug. Or survivors giving themselves up to the killer because they got screwed by a bug, or throwing pebbles at killers and shaking their camera around like a madman. This is something people don't realize about Dead by Daylight that NEVER happens in other games. Literally losing on purpose because it's nice, or it's funny. There's a level of understanding and empathy between both sides in a match that you don't get anywhere else.

There's also so much content to this game it's basically infinitely replayable. Only major complaint I have is you only get 4 (maybe 5) killers for free, and you have to pay up for all the others. You can theoretically grind for all the DLC killers (except for licensed ones like Myers or Demogorgon) but it's so insanely slow it's basically not even an option. 

TL;DR
If you're willing to spend a decent amount of cash for the DLC content this game is fantastic. Nothing else compares to it right now and it occupies such a unique space in the gaming world that I keep coming back.

Доброго. Если вы еще не приобрели "это", то и не совершайте глупость, как я. Ну, все по порядку. Посмотрев несколько стримов, решил то же присоедениться к забаве. Но не все так просто. Поиграть сразу не выйдет, подождите до десяти минут, пока соберется нужное количество народу.. Это за "жертву". За маньяка же, что бы сыграть, нужно поистине безграничное терпение. Моего хватило на две игры- первая "собиралась" двадцать минут, вторая вообще растянулась на тридцать пять бесцельного ожидания в тамбуре.  иначе никак, это ни разу не L4D2, ботов разработчики не завели. К этому добавляются множество прочих глюков(их действительно много(!)),убогая кастомизация героев, и один единственный(!) режим игры = в топку сей "шедевр"..
P.S. И нет тут атмосферы "ужаса и беспомощности", в любом "резиденте" на порядок больше..

Great co-op survival game!!! In the game there's survivors or the KILLER! As the survivor you try and repair generators to power up the exit gates; however, the task isn't that easy because the killer will try and stop you. There are multiple survivors and killers that are each different. Some survivors are skilled in speed, while others are better at repairing the generators. Each killer has their own special ability or weapon, and their own map. Each map is different...so you'll need to be able to adapt to each map. VERY GREAT GAME TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS OR EVEN ALONE!!! WOULD HIGHLY RECCOMEND LIKE A LOT!

10/10!!!!

-Montana5050.

*UPDATE: Don't play as often, but still fun*

This game is hella fun, WHEN IT WORKS!  Most of the time you get stuck on the lobby loading screen and the only way to get out of it is shutting it down from Task Manager. It's no longer Early Access and they've YET to work on the bug that causes equipped items to be rendered useless, which has been around since conception.  Every time they update this game the old bugs are still there and new bugs are found, yet they continue to add new monsters and survivors.  GUYS!  STOP!  If you don't fix these bugs you are really going to lose your following.  I know many who have given up on this game because of the bugs.  Love this game, but the issues make me give up when I can only successfully get into one match out of five or six attempts!  Really gets annoying.

Okay, so since the time of the post they have made a lot of improvements on the mechanics of the game, HOWEVER they have severely broken the survivor/killer balance.  If you play games to be competitive or if you are a competitive player by nature, DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME!  They have built it so that you WILL die.  If you're killer is leveled, you are going to die.  If you have a team that doesn't work together, you are going to die.  If your team is not on voice together, you are going to die.  They continually make it easier and easier for killers to kill you.  They are encouraging killers to camp you (much like corpse camping so you can't rez/respawn).  If you have friends who own the game, though, and you queue with them, it is worth getting.  Fun to hear your noob friends get salty (please be sure to be nice to them because you were there at one point too - tell them to stop caring and shake it off).  Play it like you're in a horror movie, expect that you're going to die, but have fun doing it.

The team did not solve the speed hack.

I could watch monkeys hoot at each other and I would have more fun than this garbage. Awful awful game. Love-hate relationship has turned into burning hate. DOG S H I T. MUCCI SCORE -90/10

J'adore le concept du jeu ! 
Le principe de survivre à un(e) fou/folle à lier tout en aidant ses mates est tout simplement génial. Je suis sur que entre amis, se jeu doit se révélé extrenement drole ! Un véritable coup de foudre, mis a part quelque bug lors des tentatives de connexion aux salles, etc.. qui est assez pénible. Sinon c'est un très bon jeu que je recommande fortement !
J'ai d'ailleurs fait une petite vidéo assez sympathique sur ma chaine Youtube ! Si sa interresse.. ;)
-> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lQ-FFk7TAEk
Hours of fun!

Jamás pensé que sería capaz de jugar a un juego de terror, pero a este estoy enganchadísima. Las colas de espera se buguean frecuentemente y si el host no tiene muy buena conexión puedes sufrir lags bastante grandes o tirarte de la partida perdiendo puntos de rango. A pesar de ello el juego una vez coges carrerilla resulta muy adictivo y jugar con amigos es mucho más divertido que jugar solo. El juego no es perfecto pero es completamente recomendable.

Hey guys, I am here to report a cheating player named: CLYTON THE BUNNY, he being a killer Michael but can use the saw to kill victims, and he can keep his heartbeats in the minimum distance, and, yeas one more and, he is a killer but can use the victims perks "Bond", that means he can stay in the minimum distance and know where is everyone, and use the saw get easy points! I talked with him after the game, and he juse not care! This is real cheating! Please get him banned!!!

EDIT: After so many updates, the game is actually pretty decent. They have fixed lots of stuff. The balancing is still broken from time to time depending on what they change. It has been optimized and runs a lot better and you can instantly find lobbies. 

In it's current state I would NEVER reccommend this fucked up shit. I REALLY enjoy playing it, but it's so frustrating that I barely find any lobbies. Every second or third search gets stuck in the "searching game" or "joining game" screen. The only thing you can do is to kill the process. Sometimes people can't connect to the host (the monster) so in the end it's just three/two or in the worst case only one player vs the monster. What fucks me up the most, is that the amount of gens you have to fix doesn't always adapt. I had several games where we were only three or two players, but still had to fix FIVE generators. Those kind of games are basically lost from the beginning. Of course you do lose ranks for that, too. The game isn't forgiving in any way. Winning doesn't boost the significantly rank, unless you get a certain amount of blood points. I had several games where either I was stuck or the monster was stuck inside of invisible objects/walls/planks, etc. All of this is ruining the fun. Also please give more explaination about the perks and items. What are the point categories? What do all these perks do? Why do I have to interrupt the game every time just because I need to google explanations for all these things. They are NOT anywhere explained in the game. This is just hilarious. Games should be self-explaining or at worst deliever some tooltips with good explanations. DbD is so much fun, but it has so many bugs right now, that I am currently forced to take a break and my anger towards the developers is rising with every single (unfair) game.
Dead by Dayligth é um jogo e tanto! <3
反作弊bug终于没搞到我了，趁特价支持杀鸡一波，拒绝网易，从我做起，只需要一个皮肤的价钱在这里可以当大爷，真舒服
Un juegazo. Pero el juego completo vale 90 y pico euros no vale la pena.

Basing a game on a single win condition is nowhere near enough to be charging £10 for a game let alone £15. I've never been so disatisfied with a game before in my life. Nothing about this game gets me excited, nothing about this game is difficult and nothing about this game is fun. 2/10 (and that's just because it looks half decent).

Miedo, trolleadas, tension, nervios, escapadas.
MICHAEL MYERS Y SU MUSICA MIENTRAS TE SIGUE.

Si te gusta jugar con nervios, y más acompañado de amigos: ESTE ES TU JUEGO!!!

Juego de sobrevivir y escapar de un asesino, con un sistema semirolero al subir de nivel cada personaje.

Constantes actualizaciones, sacan nuevos asesinos, mapas, todo a su tiempo pero al menos se ve que le meten dedicacion al juego.

JUGALO!

EDIT 28/05/2017: 
Despues de tantas horas, cambio el voto a negativo porque sinceramente me parece absurdo sacar DLC's pagos, ademas de no arreglar los bugs, y de que si se van los asesinos no te den los pts recolectados. Asi es como pasaron de 40k jugadores a apenas 10k.
-1/10 not scary enough

Compre este juego alla cerca de 1 mes y creo que ya con 60 h puedo realizar un analisis mas o menos completo:

Pros:
-Cada partida es normalmente distinta a la anterior
-Te haces con los controles enseguida
-Consigue envolverte casi por completo en la atmosfera que crea el juego
-Gran variedad de mapas y variedad de personajes (si no te importa pagarlos claro)

Contras:
-Si juegas como superviviente y te toque un campero la llevas clara
-Los rangos de los asesinos estan desajustados o mejor dicho desproporcionados ya que es muy sencillo subir de rango jugando como uno de ellos
-Poca variedad de objetos
-Puede resultar en ocasiones un poco repetitivo
-Ahora esta de moda eso de farmear por lo que le quita toda la esencia al juego

En resumen, es un buen juego para echarse unas partidas diarias. Lo recomiendo enormemente jugar con amigos. Si esta alguien interesado que me añada y jugamos.

Dopo le ultime patch mi sento di rivalutare il prodotto. Ora i tempi di attesa sono notevolmente ridotti anche i bug, non ho riscontrato problemi evidenti o troppo fastidiosi al momento.

A distanza di molti mesi sto continuando a giocarlo, i devs hanno portato migliorie grafiche, lobby veloce, eventi, nuovi contenuti, il gioco è molto bello nella sua semplicità non annoia mai.


Lo consiglio.
8.5/10

NO LO COMPRÉIS. Yo ya no puedo reembolsarlo, lo haría. Pantallas de carga eternas apra después jugar con gente que lleva muchas más horas en el juego y por lo tanto tiene mejores habilidades mientras tú ninguna. Después de tener que esperar (hasta 30 minutos he llegado a estar buscando) entras en partida y si tienes mala suerte caes en menos de 5 minutos y no recibes prácticamente puntos. Lleno de BUGS, mientras buscas partida te echa, o si estas con un amigo a el le emte en partida y a ti te echa y viceversa.
En definitiva, el juego se puede jugar si eres asesino, si juegas de superviviente dependes de miles de factores antes de tu propia habilidad para poder jugar.
COMPRA NO RECOMENDADA. NO ENTIENDO LA BUENA PUNTUACIÓN QUE TIENE.
